trans-unit.source: Handles the XML elements used to configure serialization by the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: 處理 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" /> 用來設定序列化的 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to handle the [<dataContractSerializer>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md), specifically, to allow the addition of types to the collection of known types.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別用來處理[ <dataContractSerializer>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md)，具體來說，若要允許使用者加入至已知型別的集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information about data contract known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需資料合約已知型別的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料合約已知型別](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of types added to the <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得已加入至 <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes" /> 屬性之型別的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DeclaredTypeElementCollection" /> that contains the known types.
